title: Binance announces the removal of 57 spot trading bots
description: Starting Sept. 29, Binance will remove Spot Trading Bots services from trading pairs including AAVE/BNB and ZIL/BNB. The announcement comes amid reports of decreasing Binance trading volumes, likened to regulatory challenges and end of zero-fee commissions. 57 down and potentially…

title: Ripple-Partner Temenos Fires Up Revolutionary Payments Hub on Billion-Dollar IBM Cloud
description: Temenos introduces the Payments Hub on IBM Cloud, making digitalization easier for banks worldwide. This solution simplifies integration with existing payment systems and boosts security and compliance. Switzerland-based financial technology firm Temenos has launched its latest product, the Temenos Payments Hub, hosted on IBM Cloud for Financial Services. This innovative solution caters to banking partners, [...]

title: Polygon Claims A Top Spot In Terms Of Tokenization And RWAs
description:
Over the past 24 hours, both MATIC and ETH saw their prices drop. Polygon was ranked 2nd, behind ETH, on the Federal Reserve’s list of tokenization examples. Many believe this is likely due to Polygon’s heavy experimentation with dApps and tokenization/RWAs. One of the founders of Polygon (MATIC), Sandeep Nailwal, shared in a post on […]

The post Polygon Claims A Top Spot In Terms Of Tokenization And RWAs appeared first on Coin Edition.
